top_comments.comment: Gigi , you have made a new standard for this song! Connecting the peace and the pain. Powerful and timeless.

pinaka magada makeup mo eh sa through the fire, wag mo na baguhin yun, parang tumanda at naging haggard ka jan, but voice astig padin. yun dalawa sa likod mo may contest ba palakihan ng tyan bago mag december lol
Galing mo Gigi sana maging international star ka.Yong smiles moy stress reliever.

PLSS SING DEFYING GRAVITY 
THAT IS THE FIRST SONG THAT I'VE HEARD YOU SING IN TV
IYAN DIN KUNG BAKIT TILL NOW NAKA SUBAYBAY PA DIN AKO SAYO HERE IN YOUTUBE

comments_since_last_sample.body: Charice version is more on richer tone and powerful F5 chesty belt ..while Gigi added some flavor that made it nasal, more raspier and sexy
Galing naman talaga! Your fan here in Las Vegas, Nevada
